main.name: Mae Zhang
main.description: I'm an undergraduate student at Carnegie Mellon University, expected to graduate in 2023. Learn more about me and my projects here!
main.bio: I am an adventurous nerd who likes to learn and explore new things. As an engineer, I strive to not only produce solutions, but also continue to improve them as I push my own boundaries. In my free time, I love to solve puzzles, play board games, and hike.

education.degree: Bachelors in Electrical and Computer Engineering
education.description: At CMU, I've pushed myself to become a more proficient coder, as well as explore the hardware aspect of ECE. Outside of academia, I indulge in my love of puzzles as a member of Puzzlehunt and am trying entirely new things such as ballroom dancing and mechanicing for CIA Buggy.

Music was an instrumental part of my high school experience. As a piano player and percussion captain in my high school band, music not only channeled my creativity and persistance, but boosted by ability to lead and work well with others. Music nerds rejoice!

work.title: Intern
work.description: Supportchef is a drag and drop app builder website currently being developed by Sean Keenan and co. I worked on the Styling page, which allows app builders to customize their themes, colors, and fonts. Through this project, I was introduced to JavaScript, ReactJS, HTML, CSS, and other JavaScript libraries.

work.title: Research Intern
work.description: Produced potential compounds to inhibit the transcription factor NRF2, increasing effects of chemotherapy. Implemented purification techniques such as thin layer chromatography and column chromatography.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear
projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

projects.title: Original Thai Food
projects.category: Website I built for a restaurant I like in Thailand

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website template

projects.title: Smirkspace
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: MAE IS A-MAE-ZING. U SHULD HIGHER HER. U WILL BE A-MAE-ZED
